definition: analog-to-digital/abbr. for 模擬到數字|模拟到数字
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Reasonably determining drainage modulus is very important for decreasing logging loss in diked area.
sentences.chinese: 合理确定圩区排涝模数对于降低涝灾损失有重要意义。

sentences.english: The wind erosion modulus in artificial pasture was less than that in cropland.
sentences.chinese: 人工草地的风蚀模数小于农田，生态效益优于农田。

sentences.english: The gear sector of variable transmission ratio in automobile steering mechanism is a variable module non-circular gear.
sentences.chinese: 变传动比汽车转向器齿扇是变模数的非圆齿轮。

sentences.english: Using the concept of fatigue test to design a modular expansion joint.
sentences.chinese: 采用疲劳试验概念设计模数化伸缩缝。

sentences.english: The first essential step in analog-to-digital conversion is to sample an analog signal.
sentences.chinese: 模数转换关键性的第一步是对模拟信号进行采样。

sentences.english: To reasonably determine drainage modulus is very important for decreasing logging loss in diked area.
sentences.chinese: 合理确定圩区排涝模数对于降低涝灾损失有重要意义。

sentences.english: Failure analysis on fissuring of high-speed steel cold extrusion die plate;
sentences.chinese: 本文提出对大模数花键成形采用冷挤压加工工艺。

sentences.english: The output of the sample - and - hold system now goes into an analog - to - digital converter .
sentences.chinese: 取样和保持系统的输出现在又进入一个模数转换器。

sentences.english: It also introduces relations between the bucket arch and modern building modular.
sentences.chinese: 及斗拱与现代建筑模数的关系。

sentences.english: Another characteristic of the design of the college should be regarded as its strict modularized design.
sentences.chinese: 学院设计的另一个特点应认为是严格的模数化设计。

sentences.english: Analog to digital converters (ADCs) are the key blocks in many electronic products.
sentences.chinese: 模数转换器是很多现代电子设备的核心电路模块。

sentences.english: I finally narrowed down the problem to microprocessor churning during analog-to-digital-conversion cycles.
sentences.chinese: 我最终将问题定位到微处理器在模数转换期间的扰动。

sentences.english: The rolling technique for fine-module involute spline shaft possesses many advantages.
sentences.chinese: 小模数渐开线花键齿轴的滚压技术有很多优点。

sentences.english: Heat treated boards display a reduced modulus of rupture and an increase in dustiness.
sentences.chinese: 经过热处理后，板材的断裂模数变小，而含尘量增加。

definition: external diameter (including thickness of the wall)
(of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
